sections.info: An IV Bag that looks nervous
sections.obtaining: After using the ball to get on the ```Matchstick Factory``` for [[Squeaky Hammer]], you must jump down to the walls of the 2nd floor and dance clip inside.

{{CharacterInfo |name=IV Bag |character=[[File:IV Bag.png]] |difficulty=[[File:Dreadful.png|link=]] '''Dreadful''' |area=[[Yoyleland]] |hint=factory |additionalinfo }} == Info == An IV Bag that looks nervous == Obtaining == '''''The following text will show instructions on how to get this object. If you wish to find it by yourself, avoid opening the text.'''''
After using the ball to get on the ```Matchstick Factory``` for [[Squeaky Hammer]], you must jump down to the walls of the 2nd floor and dance clip inside.
